title: Yasuo
body: Someone please give me a list of counters for Yasuo both top and mid. I am sick of him. Please and Thank You

replies.body: Facts: Yasuo is one of the most feared in soloQ but he only has around 46% win rate.

There are 2 types of counter:

**Hard counter:** There is almost nothing your champ can do against the enemy champion.

**Soft counter:** You can still fight the enemy champion, but they have the advantage.

An example of a hard counter is: 'Aurelion Sol VS Yasuo' Aurelion Sol can't to anything when fighting Yasuo 1v1, all of Yasuo's moves make Aurelion Sol's moves useless.
An example of a soft counter is: 'Fizz vs Lissandra', Lissandra makes life very difficult for Fizz by constantly CCing him, and blocking his ult with her own, but Fizz still has a fighting chance if he plays well. 

Here is the punch-line: **Yasuo has no hard counters.** There is no champ in the game, that Yasuo can not play against.

In saying that however, he does have soft counters, the ones i can remember are:

Annie
Irelia
Vladimir
Tryndamere
Fizz
Riven
Zed
Lissandra

Pretty much the only way to kill Yasuo is to outburst him, or lock him down while someone else kills him. 
_Prolonged battles almost always are in Yasuo's favour due to no mana, as many dashes as he wants, and 100% crit coupled with life steal._

So champs like Fizz and Zed have enough damage to kill him before Yas gets his full combo off, and are also slippery enough, to chase him. While champions like Lissandra are good at stopping him from dashing around so that a team mate can hill him off.

But like Knuuckles says, most of them are Skill match ups, so a good Yasuo will still beat an average Lissandra. don't expect a free lane like Yasuo does against Aurelion Sol.
